title: 064 - Does Mark Zuckerberg Drink Sunscreen?
description: On today's show, Connor gives the guys a quick breakdown of his golf game from this past weekend, the guys discuss the correct way to drink coffee, Kanye going off the deep end on Twitter the other night and how uncomfortable the video he released with Dave Chappelle was, what the best Robin Williams movie of all-time is, Mark Zuckerberg using an entire industrial sized bottle of sunscreen on his face, Bill gives everyone a rundown of the best Hooters food and how the upper management chain works there, and the guys decide which Avenger they would want to be the most and if there will ever be another franchise like that. We appreciate you for listening, enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
